original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes weaker at 292.55/75 to dollar, bonds steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed weaker at 292.55/75 to the US dollar on Monday from 292.40/70 on Friday, dealers said, while bond yields were broadly steady.
A bond maturing on 15.12.2026 closed at 9.40/55 percent, up from up 9.40/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2029 closed stable at 10.65/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 10.95/11.10 percent, from 11.00/10 percent. (Colombo/Dec307/2024)
